text: Head Rush is a science show that shows many facts about science. ==Cast== * Kari Bryon, the director * Dr. Michio Kaku, the narrator/director of Sci Fi Science * Adam Savage, a narrator of MythBusters * Jamie Hyneman, the other narrator of MythBusters * Buster, a crash test dummy of MythBusters who does not speak ==Other websites== * Head Rush : Science Channel * Mythbusters: Official Site * Dr. Michio Kaku Category:American television series
title: Head Rush (TV show)
